institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 14 (Autonomous Joint Training Center Business Plan Review, etc.)
contents: Article 14 (Examination of business plans of autonomous joint training centers, etc.) ① Notwithstanding Article 13, the Chairman may only review and decide on the appropriateness of the support fund regarding the business plan submitted by the autonomous joint training center. However, cases where an institution selected as an autonomous joint training center pursuant to Article 11, Paragraph 1, Item 1 do not fall within the top 20/100 range of the previous year's performance evaluation pursuant to Article 18-2 of the Regulations are excluded. ② Notwithstanding paragraph 1, if the need for proper operation of the consortium business is recognized in consideration of human resources supply and demand, industrial demand, etc., the Chairman may review and decide on the entire business plan of the joint training center.
